entry.title: Climbing in Bishop
entry.content:
Went on a nine day climbing trip down to Bishop California with a bunch of climbing folk from Winnipeg.

I’ve never been specifically on a bouldering trip but turns out that just climbing with pads is pretty rad.

On the way back we took slight detour and checked out the Moab, UT area.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t0ea1e989pe036g/20150215_090832.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > We got there at 3am and slept under the stairs. I woke up first.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/immgh9550ov052a/20150216_153120.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > Oh hey look at that boulder with the v15 and v16.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/kgvr1ep5ndewdaz/20150218_164126.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > Chris is the king!

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/u6yumvwcltp3cuw/20150220_153526.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > Tyler climbing “The Clapper” in the happy boulders.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/bmp9q603rrt7rqo/20150221_114246.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > Ray, Casey, Chris. My favourite people.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/w2j3x6qrqf6d2e2/20150221_140355.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > I also ran into Jesus out in the desert.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/6aezgues6p1eo6m/20150221_134602.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > Arches National Park right outside of moab. Probably the coolest place I’ve been to so far.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/0mjp9ngusw1cd4k/20150221_140941.jpg?dl=0” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” > We scrambled along some of those rock ridges.

entry.title: Treeplanting 2014 - Highlights
entry.content:
It was my second year of planting out in BC. Mostly around kamloops. Feeling fairly nostalgic about it right now although if I end up back there (as if it’s even a question) I’m probably going to hate most of it.

Here’s the gang. Left to right: Simon, Kiddo, Sara, Kent. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37171751/the%20gang.JPG” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” >

Another one on the same cutblock with the truck in frame. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37171751/truck.JPG” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” >

Tosh looking like a wolf hanging out with me as I load up my bags with trees. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37171751/tosh.JPG” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” >

Cool panorama of, I believe, the last block we planted for the year. https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37171751/pano.JPG” title=”[1024] [235] [[]]” >

Kiddo’s cold… https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37171751/kiddo%20is%20cold.JPG” title=”[1024] [765] [[]]” >
